entry.title: Refactored code
entry.content:
commit 8ad22b2269a5b70e8f126c4ba6e7b00d01d7aa75 parent 7a4d1a6f15ddc727da241303da4f1012b9c35a9e Author: Borislav Kosharov <boby_dsm@abv.bg> Date: Fri, 7 Jun 2013 00:12:02 +0300
Refactored code
Changed target framework from 4.0 to 4.5 Expiration: * Removed dictionary imlementation and imlicit conversions Paste: * Moved NewPaste() to Paste class * Renamed NewPaste() to Create() * Added XML documentation comments * Renamed Date to CreateDate PasteFormat: * Renamed to Language Pastebin: * Added XML documentation comments * Moved NewPaste() methods to Paste class * Moved const strings to Utills PastebinException: * Added new ctor for nested exceptions User: * Renemed Default* properties to Prefered* * Removed devKey field as it was unnesisary Utills: * Added const strings from Pastebin * Added exception handling in PostRequest()
